title: FS: T206 Johnny Evers (Chi. shirt) PSA 7oc, Only $350! **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Johnny Evers (Chi. shirt) PSA 7oc, Only $350! **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Very sharp corners, Pied 350 back, centering not that bad either for an o/c qualifier. Card also has outstanding color and solid borders.  $450 delivered, please email for scans.  A recent PSA 5 sold for over $500...  FINAL $350 delivered! **SOLD**
Evers still available, don't know why. A recent PSA 5 sold for over $500. This card is a fantastic buy..
